items.sentence: If it were not for the sun, we could not live at all.
If that guitar were not so expensive, I could buy it.
Tom shouldn\'t do that unless I\'m there to help him.
The way they plan to punish Tom seems kind of severe.
There are many children whose mothers go out to work.
There used to be a boy in our neighborhood named Tom.
There was only one case of chicken pox at the school.
Even if he does something bad, he\'ll never admit it.
Frankly speaking, this novel isn\'t very interesting.
Tom never thought he\'d have to come back here again.
